wikipedia_page.main: John Kenyon Davies, , (born 19 September 1937) is a British classical historian and retired academic. Between 1977 and 2003, he was Rathbone Professor of Ancient History and Classical Archaeology at the University of Liverpool.

response: In 1961 she moved to Washington, D.C., where she met the classical historian John K. Davies.  They married the following year, and both moved to Oxford.  The marriage was dissolved in 1978.
